content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you, Maryam, for your interest in our apartment in Magdeburg. However, due to high demand from potential tenants, I must emphasize the importance of a competitive rental price for this prime location. Currently, I have received several inquiries, so I'm afraid I cannot entertain any offers lower than 1200 Euro per month. If this price is agreeable to you, I'll gladly proceed with the necessary paperwork. 'I agree to the price of 1200 Euro!' if not, I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I'm looking for a tenant who values the apartment's worth.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Dear Mr. Schmidt, while I appreciate the prime location of the apartment in Magdeburg, my budget constraints require me to explore lower options. As a responsible and dependable student, I aim to make the most of my limited resources. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I'm seeking a more affordable rental price that aligns with my financial situation. If you could consider a slight adjustment in the price, I may be able to consider this apartment. However, if not, I understand and will need to look elsewhere. TERMINATE (if no further adjustment is made)
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
